overview_of_class: This course is a continuation of Chemistry 212-1 and builds upon the foundation provided by that course.
name: Organic Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 212-2-01 Organic Chemistry
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 232-2.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is a continuation of Chemistry 212-1 and builds upon the foundation provided by that course.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 212-1 and Chemistry 232-1
Students enrolled in Chem 212-2 must also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chem 232-2.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: 1. "Organic Chemistry" by Clayden et al., Oxford Univ. Press, 2nd Edition

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
1. Solutions Manual to Accompany Organic Chemistry by Clayden et al.
2. Molecular Model Kit

subject: CHEM
